Respiratory Tract Diseases/Lung Diseases/Lung Diseases, Interstitial/Alveolitis, Extrinsic Allergic/Farmer's Lung
Immune System Diseases/Hypersensitivity/Hypersensitivity, Immediate/Respiratory Hypersensitivity/Alveolitis, Extrinsic Allergic/Farmer's Lung
Respiratory Tract Diseases/Respiratory Hypersensitivity/Alveolitis, Extrinsic Allergic/Farmer's Lung
Record.Description: A form of alveolitis or pneumonitis due to an acquired hypersensitivity to inhaled antigens associated with farm environment. Antigens in the farm dust are commonly from bacteria actinomycetes (SACCHAROPOLYSPORA and THERMOACTINOMYCES), fungi, and animal proteins in the soil, straw, crops, pelts, serum, and excreta.
